note.p: Birth: Dorset House, London, England (16 September 1622)

Career: MP for East Grinstead (1640-1643); imprisoned by Parliament (1642) and fined Â£1500 (1644); Commissioner of the Militia for Middlesex (1660); joint Lord Lieutenant of Middlesex (1660-1670); joint Lord Lieutenant of Sussex (1670-1677); Member of the Commission for the Trial of the Regicides
Proposers: James Compton, 3rd Earl of Northampton
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB (Sackville, Edward); Aubrey; Hunter
